column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Karan - Thank you for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate it! We are so proud to be considered your favorite ramen spot
column2: especially given how many more choices one has these days when it comes to ramen. We thank you for your kind words
column3: and we are also glad you enjoyed our Spicy Vegan Ramen. Thank you again
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
